newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks lose ground in sluggish trade.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks lose ground in sluggish trade.

text.p: Croatian stocks lost ground in sluggish activity on Thursday, with few issues resisting the downward trend.
* Seven of 14 active issues fell, two rose, four were flat and one traded for the first time.
* Volume shrank to 5,092 shares, turnover was more than three times lower at 2.9 million kuna.
* Top decliner electrical group Koncar fell 65 kuna or 5.2 percent to 1,180 kuna, with 31 units sold.
* Bigger of the two gainers, brewery Karlovacka Pivovara, added 11 kuna or 1.86 percent to 601 on volume of 905 shares.
* Most actively traded chocolate maker Kras sold 1,038 shares and closed stable at 435 kuna.
